title: Drawing, "View of Lake Konigssee with the Falkenstein, near Berchtesgaden, Bavaria, Germany, Part 2", July 11, 1868
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on blue paper
markings:
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower right: Lugt 457c
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower center: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower left: Presented 1917/ by Mr. Louis P. Church [5 or 8 ...?]; and again, at lower right:  Konigsee / July 11th 68 / 2d part.
description: Horizontal view of Lake Konigssee from the Malerwinkel, showing steep slope and the Falkenstein.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View of Lake Konigssee with the Falkenstein, near Berchtesgaden, Bavaria, Germany, Part 2", July 11, 1868.
July 11, 1868. Graphite, brush and white gouache on blue paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-563-b.
